reviewText: Started out good. Not what we expected. Closer to end of cd, started having problems with it playing without hanging up in spots.
My husband really enjoyed seeing this again decades after it first was released!!
The interviews with the cowboys and producer for the anniversary special were as good as the documentary itself. We loved reliving that time in our lives!!
ordered this movie for father in law who has been looking for it for 2 decades and if was as expected vary much perfect in service and fast .

This movie-documentary has a lot of information about rodeo, the action is great,it has lots of great rides, great runs, accidents, spills and thrills and it gives a more intimate glimpse of the life of rodeo cowboys of that era. Disney took great care to feature the great bucking bull Oscar who was on display live at the Pro rodeo Hall of Fame for a number of years, the blood line of about 90% of the great bucking bulls of the last 30 years can probably be traced back to Oscar. My question is: Why hasn't this classic jewel been released on DVD?

My father had been looking everywhere for this movie (except the internet) because he has no computer. He is so hard to shop for because he needs or wants nothing. The fact he actually had been searching for this and that I found it for him in two seconds made us both very excited. The movie was shipped right away and came in excellent condition. He has enjoyed it several times. I just went for a visit and finally got to see it myself. Great quality. thank you
